thread.title: Ski wax containing the chemicals has been found to pollute remote mountain slopes
thread.title_full: Ski wax containing the chemicals has been found to pollute remote mountain slopes

author: Nicolas TUCAT
title: Ski wax containing the chemicals has been found to pollute remote mountain slopes
text:
France's parliament on Thursday voted to limit the production and sale of some items containing polluting and health-threatening "forever chemicals" including cosmetics, most clothing and ski wax in the Alpine nation.
